title: Replace boost flexUSD/EMBER with bcBCH/EMBER
content:
Replace the current boost allocation for flexUSD/EMBER with bcBCH/EMBER (BlockNG-Peg Bitcoin Cash). By replacing the boost flexUSD will still remain farmable as it still is in the top 3 of most liquid tokens.

  

Expected positive impact

 Hopefully this could be one of many steps to incentivize BSC users bridging over to smartBCH.
options: Yes - remove from flexUSD add to bcBCH
